name: Coin Hunter+
description:
Tap, click & earn treasures! It’s time to start your magical journey!

Coin Hunter is a board game! Casual, easy to play but exciting. All the surprises are in a mystery island, which is full of amazing treasures: Coins, diamonds, fate cards and so on. Let’s try your luck now!

Features:
-Tap to roll magic dice:
By easily one tap, the magic dice will be rolled. You will hop around to a random cell, meet different events, some events brings you coins or diamonds, but some events…
All you need is just some luck!

-Get rewards through "lucky event”:
Some of events will bring you tons of treasure, don’t miss that!

-Solve the problem you may met to:
Don’t let the roadblock block you to make the fortune!

-Value each choose:
Choose the fate card carefully, which could let you win more!

-Daily check-in:
Tons of treasure are prepared to persevering hunter!

-Mystery box:
Random reward in the box, let’s check!

-Build your house:
Use diamonds to build the house, the higher of the level, the more surprise you will get.

Tips:
You can get free rolls every 4 hours! Enjoy it!
